item.description: U.S. Center for SafeSport, created after the Larry Nassar scandal, can expect more scrutiny after a court found it guilty of fraud.

item.title: Study: Concealed Carriers Do A Better Job Of Stopping Active Shooters Than Police
item.description: We found that concealed carry permit holders stopped 51.5 percent of active shootings, compared to 44.6 percent stopped by police.

item.title: Drag Queens And Billionaires Rally For Far-Left WI Supreme Court Candidate
item.description: Bianca Lynn Breeze, the drag queen alter ego of Brandon Rounds, will lead a Drag Bingo fundraiser for Judge Susan Crawford.
